items.title: Water Saving
items.text: Our WCs have a special bowl structure & are specifically designed to flush with both lower and typical water volumes.

items.title: Space Saving
items.text: A Wall-hung WC takes up less from than a convential WC, and the consoled installation offers flexibility in confined spaces.

items.title: Washbasin Forms
items.text: Washbasins can be used with a pedestal as well as being wall - hung.

items.title: Rim Less Technology
items.text: Offering effortless cleaning and innovative, hygiene design.
